title: RTGS 60 LEDs String Lights Battery Operated on 20 Feet Long Silver Color Wire, Indoor and Outdoor with Waterproof Battery Box and Timer (Warm White)
features: EXTRA-LUMINOUS LIGHT - With 60 super bright, warm white colored LED lights, these string fairy lights create a brilliant, magical atmosphere. These decorative lights can be used indoors to decorate bedrooms, or you can use them as outdoor Christmas lights. The ultra-thin silver wire is 21ft long, with 4in between each bulb.

BATTERY-OPERATED - These starry string lights are powered by 6 AA batteries (not included). The black, waterproof battery pack is easy to hide. The batteries last at least 14 days when used in “Timer” mode and at least 48 hours when left on continuously. Since you don’t need to plug in the lights, they can be used as decorations just about anywhere.

WATERPROOF, STURDY AND BENDABLE - Our LED string lights are sturdy, bendable, and completely submersible underwater (however, the battery pack should not be placed underwater). Make any occasion or space extra special with these popular fairy lights. The lights can be easily shaped and bent around patios, dorm furniture, flower gardens, vases, centerpieces, mason jars, curtains, and costumes.

VERSATILE - These string lights are great for any occasion. Use them for birthdays, weddings, dinner parties, and girls’ night in. Create a beautiful Christmas, Easter, or Thanksgiving centerpiece. Decorate a dorm room or line a garden pathway. Decorate a cornhole board for a party or line your fishing boat. You can even bring the lights on a camping trip or a bicycle ride.

MANY VARIETIES TO CHOOSE FROM - We have many varieties of electric string lights to choose from, making it easy for you to find one that meets your needs. Choose from blue, green, pink, red, cold white, or warm white LED lights. You can also choose between silver wire and green wire. We make several different lengths of string lights.
description: These super bright, decorative string lights by RTGS Products are perfect for a variety of uses. Whether you want to put up Christmas lights indoors or decorate your outdoor patio, these battery-powered fairy lights look beautiful. Make any space light up like the starry night sky. Whatever the occasion—birthdays, weddings, dinner parties, girls’ night in, holidays—these lights create an amazing atmosphere. The string includes 60 cold white colored LED lights spaced 4in apart on a silver wire that measures about 21ft long. They are much thinner than traditional rope lights and easily bend around patios, gardens, furniture, vases, centerpieces, mason jars, curtains, costumes, etc. Powered by 6 AA batteries (not included), these lights use a fraction of the energy needed by other light strings. The waterproof battery pack features a button to select between three different modes. Press the button once to select the “Timer” mode. The “Timer” mode means that the lights remain lit for six hours, then turn off for 18 hours. The lights turn on and off at exactly the same time every day according to when you activated the timer. Full batteries will last over 14 days in the “Timer” mode. Press the button twice to select the constant “On” mode. In this mode, the lights remain constantly lit for over 48 hours with full batteries. Press the button three times to select the constant “Off” mode. In this mode, the lights remain off until a different mode is selected. These RTGS light strings will last 20 years. We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee and a two-year warranty on this product. RTGS Products is the exclusive designer, manufacturer, and seller of RTGS string lights. Only RTGS lights purchased directly from us are guaranteed to be the highest-quality, brightest, and longest-lasting lights.
